original_text: I am ready to do what is right for them. I am ready to save them. I will judge all the nations fairly. Lands that are far away will wait for me to help them. They wait for me to come and rule them all with power. I am ready to do what is right for them. I am ready to save them. I will judge all the nations fairly. Lands that are far away will wait for me to help them. They wait for me to come and rule them all with power. I am ready to do what is right for them.
korean_text: 내 공의가 가깝고 내 구원이 나갔은즉 내 팔이 만민을 심판하리니 섬들이 나를 앙망하여 내 팔에 의지하리라

sentences.original_text: I am ready to do what is right for them.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그들을 위해 옳은 일을 할 준비가 되어 있다.

sentences.original_text: I am ready to save them.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그들을 구원할 준비가 되어 있다.

sentences.original_text: I will judge all the nations fairly.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 모든 나라를 공정하게 판단할 것이다.

sentences.original_text: Lands that are far away will wait for me to help them.
sentences.korean_translation: 먼 나라들은 내가 그들을 도와주시길 기다릴 것이다.

sentences.original_text: They wait for me to come and rule them all with power.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 내가 와서 모두 능력으로 다스리기를 기다린다.

sentences.original_text: I am ready to do what is right for them.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그들을 위해 옳은 일을 할 준비가 되어 있다.

sentences.original_text: I am ready to save them.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그들을 구원할 준비가 되어 있다.

sentences.original_text: I will judge all the nations fairly.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 모든 나라를 공정하게 판단할 것이다.

sentences.original_text: Lands that are far away will wait for me to help them.
sentences.korean_translation: 먼 나라들은 내가 그들을 도와주시길 기다릴 것이다.

sentences.original_text: They wait for me to come and rule them all with power.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 내가 와서 모두 능력으로 다스리기를 기다린다.

sentences.original_text: I am ready to do what is right for them.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그들을 위해 옳은 일을 할 준비가 되어 있다.
